dct_title_s: Important farmlands of Weld County, Colorado
dct_alternative_sm: Important farmlands of Weld County, Colorado
dct_description_sm: "Compiled by USGS from 1:24,00-scale topographic maps dated 1972-1978. Partially revised from aerial photographs taken 1975. Map edited 1979."; "Projection and 10 000-meter grid ticks, zone 13: Universal Transverse Mercator."; "25 000-foot grid ticks based on Colorado coordinate system, north zone."; Sheet 1 has text on verso.; Includes location diagram.
on 3 sheets 59 x 89 and 59 x 59 centimeters
dct_publisher_sm: Dept. of Agriculture, Soil Conservation Service (Fort Collins, Colo.)
